products.title: Orient Faux Silk Ebony Roman Blind
products.description: Their orient faux-silk roman blinds are carefully made, look beautiful when fitted, and are light and durable. This ebony faux-silk roman blind, introduces a bold blackshade to your window, and looks fabulous either with matching or contrasting accessories. Add a touch of luxury to your home with their hand-made roman blinds. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why not only is this roman hand-made by an expert team, but it also comes with a free five year warranty, for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Faux Suede Deluxe Black Roman Blind
products.description: Simple yet stylish the black faux suede roman blind is the perfect finish for both the modern contemporaryhome. Their faux suede collection comes in a variety of colours which include pinks, naturals and tones of colour which are highly sought after in todays interiors. All their blinds are made to measure to your measurements right here in west yorkshire. Their skilled seamstresses hold a wealth of experience, so you can be assured that a quality roman blind will be manufactured and delivered to you.

products.title: Panama Black Roman Blind
products.description: Their panama range is avilable in a full rainbow of colours so we are sure you will find the shade to compliment your dcor. This 100% cotton black roman blind is classic and so is the perfect choice to add style and elegance to any room in your home. Product id: db-rom0112 fabric colour: black material: 100% cotton panama lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Scandi Spring Noir Roman Blind
products.description: Part of their nordic-inspire designs, scandi spring brings nature inside with modern design and soft yet eye-catching palettes. Product id: db-rom0908 fabric colour: noir material: 100% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets. Control type: smooth chain operation - great for a durable, even finish energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes scandi spring noir roman blind in black.

products.title: Forest Leaves Noir Roman Blind
products.description: Bring nature inside with their fabulous forest leaves collection. With colours that suit any season, this fabric would add a fresh, vibrant feel to your home. Seriously on trend for todays living this design is being used in a variety of rooms within the home. Fully manufactured in their own factory in huddersfield, your roman blind will be fully quality checked and sent out to their high standards.

products.title: Basket Weave Black Roman Blind
products.description: Their basket weave range is a combination of the soft fabric and attractive colours. Available as curtains and roman blinds, you will be able to find the one that suits your style. The basket weave black roman blind is an excellent choice to transform your home. Product id: db-rom0019 fabric colour: black material: 73%polyester 27%viscose lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.description: Their nordic-inspired pyramids collection ad vibrancy to your room with a modern twist.
